item.title: Data: Institutions steadily accumulated Bitcoin throughout the year, increasing their holdings by approximately 400,000 coins in the first eight months.
item.description: On September 4th, according to Sentora data, the holdings of the Bitcoin Treasury Company have been on the rise every month this year. Despite the continuous market turmoil, the steady accumulation shows enduring institutional confidence.In January of this year, the Bitcoin Treasury Company held 1,417,058 BTC, and by August, it had increased to 1,813,247 BTC.

item.title: Binance Alpha will list Tradoor (TRADOOR) with a minimum threshold of 220 points.
item.description: September 4th. Binance Alpha is set to list Tradoor (TRADOOR). Alpha trading will commence on September 4th, 2025 at 20:00 (UTC+8). Users who hold at least 220 Alpha Points can claim 50 Tradoor airdropped tokens on a first-come, first-served basis. If the event is still in progress, the points threshold will decrease by 15 points automatically every hour. It should be noted that claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Alpha Points. Users must confirm the claim on the Alpha event page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be regarded as a waiver of the airdrop.

item.title: James Wynn has recently made multiple high-leverage long positions on ETH, resulting in liquidation at the bottom.
item.description: On September 4th, according to the monitoring of LookOnChain, James Wynn has recently taken on a number of high-leverage long positions on ETH. However, he was liquidated at a loss:On September 2nd, after ETH rose above $4400, James Wynn went all in with a long position. On September 3rd, when ETH dropped below $4280, James Wynn was liquidated;From the night of September 3rd to this morning, James Wynn added to his long position near $4440. Currently, ETH has fallen back to around $4370. One hour ago, James Wynn was partially liquidated again. The remaining position was liquidated at $4339, with a position value of approximately $320,000.

item.title: Analysis: Bitcoin Slightly Above Key Monthly Bull Market Support Level, Market in Recovery Phase
item.description: On September 4th, CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr. made a post stating that any form of recovery might have the potential to drive the Bitcoin price back above $113,000 and move towards the fair range of the 30-day moving average. The recent bullish scenario involves a technical rebound reaching the $113,000 to $115,000 range, and the on-chain flows are also trending towards stability. The current Bitcoin price of $110,700 is slightly higher than the realized price of Short-Term Holders (STH), which is $107,600 (a crucial monthly bull market support level). It remains bullish on a higher time frame but the market is in a recuperative phase and is sensitive to profit-taking.

item.title: Binance Completes Chromia (CHR) Mainnet Integration
item.description: On September 4th, Binance has accomplished the integration of the Chromia (CHR) mainnet and has made deposits and withdrawals available.

item.title: 24-Hour Spot Funding In/Out Rankings: WLFI Net Outflow of $32.2M, XRP Net Inflow of $16.78M
item.description: On September 4th, based on Coinglass data, the top net outflows of funds in the cryptocurrency spot market within the past 24 hours are as follows:The net outflow of BTC is $49 million;The net outflow of WLFI is $32.2 million;The net outflow of SOL is $27 million;The net outflow of DOLO is $22 million;The net outflow of DOGE is $21 million.The top net inflows of funds in the cryptocurrency spot market are as follows:The net inflow of XRP is $16.78 million;The net inflow of HOME is $10 million;The net inflow of ETH is $5.95 million;The net inflow of AAVE is $5.38 million;The net inflow of TRX is $4.2 million.

item.title: A whale deposited 2.43 million USDC into HyperLiquid, went long with 3x leverage, and pumped the price.
item.description: On September 4th, as per the monitoring of OnchainLens, a whale deposited 2.43 million USDC into HyperLiquid and initiated a 3x leveraged PUMP long position.

item.title: Cumberland received 10 million WLFI tokens 2 hours ago, or may have joined the liquidity pool.
item.description: On September 4th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), Cumberland DRW may have entered the ranks of WLFI liquidity providers. It received 10 million WLFI tokens from BitGo 2 hours ago, with a value of approximately $2.05 million. In the past 24 hours, it has had relatively frequent small on-chain transactions. Additionally, Cumberland is also one of the liquidity providers for the TRUMP token.If this is true, WLFI now has liquidity providers including DWF, Jump, and Cumberland.

item.title: Gate Founder Dr. Han: The Crypto Market Enters a New Stage of "Dual-Engine Drive with CEX and DEX"
item.description: On September 4th, the founder and CEO of Gate, Dr. Han, delivered a keynote speech at the WebX 2025 Summit in Tokyo. He systematically expounded on the key roles of centralized exchanges (CEX) and decentralized exchanges (DEX) in promoting the mass adoption of Web3. Dr. Han pointed out that the long-term trend of user growth, the dual-track evolution of the market structure, and the trade-off between security and compliance jointly shape the new landscape where "CEX serves as the global capital gateway and DEX acts as the on-chain finance and innovation engine."Dr. Han cited data showing that the global crypto user base has approached 700 million, accounting for 10% of the global population. The total crypto market capitalization is $3.02 trillion, officially ranking as the world's fourth-largest asset. He predicted that by 2030, crypto assets are expected to rise to $41.8 trillion, second only to gold. In terms of trading patterns, DEX has captured 23% of the spot trading volume, wh

item.title: NVIDIA is planning to launch a new AI chip in the Chinese market, with the price potentially being double that of the H20
item.description: On September 4th, Market News: NVIDIA (NVDA.O) intends to introduce a new artificial intelligence chip into the Chinese market. If approved, the price might be twice that of the H20 chip. (FXStreet)
